UPDATE!
DOwnload VIRTUAL PC from microsoft website, it allows you to install win98 or win200..wat ever O/S and then install this game...it tells you its formatiing c:\ but its not, its creating a Fake Disk image for a partitiion to trick the o/s to install. then its like working with a remote desktop with full screen..either that or buy a $100 system that comes with win98 on it.

DO NOT DOWNLOAD!
This torrent has 2 viruses/trojans.
Generic5.NTB
Downloader.Agent2.ALJ

nothing harmful. its to bypass cd checks, and the trainer injects code into the games memory. you will see this with EVERY game on torrent sites-
